item.title: Decoding HDR Image Formats (Part One): Basic Concepts of Gainmap
item.description: This is the first part of a series on decoding HDR still image formats. It aims to introduce the basic concept of a new image format: the Gainmap. By adding a gainmap layer and metadata, it enables the storage of HDR still images. Its key feature is that it's an HDR format based on relative luminance, with excellent SDR compatibility.
